author: Wayne Ma in Beijing
title: PlayerUnknown: Tencent Can’t Make Money Off Top Mobile Games - WSJ
text:
Chinese internet giant Tencent Holdings Ltd. is having trouble making money from two of the biggest mobile games in its home market.
People familiar with the matter say the difficulties stem from China’s unofficial economic sanctions against South Korea for its decision to install a U.S. missile-defense system—even though there were signs of improving ties last year.
Tencent...
